QuestData.Title: Forces of Perdition
QuestData.Description:
Survival requires that we keep our enemies in check, Maw Walker.
With Gorgoa overflowing, the Mawsworn continue to gain strength.
Perdition Hold has been fortified with fresh troops. We cannot allow the Mawsworn to bolster their ranks any further.
Make your way into Perdition Hold and decimate their forces. When the work is done, you may return to me for your reward.
QuestData.LogDescription:
Kill Mawsworn Troops within Perdition Hold in The Maw.
Suggested Players [3]
QuestData.RewardText: A small victory, Maw Walker. Many more will be required.
